name: Psycho Dentist
description:
You will never forget to brush your teeth again! Overview

Team: Psycho Dentist's
Projekttitel: Psycho Dentist (https://www.facebook.com/Psycho-Dentist-1200513603352797/)
Genre: Trash-, Versus-, Multiplayer-, Arena Fighter
Perspective: Third-Person
Target audience: 16+
Gamemode: local Multiplayer
Platforms: PC
Controls: Gamepad
Engine: Unity 5
Artstyle: 2D Pixelart

Game Vision

In this 4 Player Game, you defeat others by battling them out of the Arena. To do this you have to destroy the teeth first, by smashing your rivals against them.

Experience 

- PVP with four players competing in an arena. The arena consists of the oral cavity of a dentist patient.

- Destroy teeth with your opponents and then throw them out of your mouth

Doctor's office team:
Denny Jonas (Art & Animation / Production / Game Design)
Marina Bötel  (Character-, Environment Art / Production / Game Design)
Peter Renkewitz (Programming / Game Design)
Theo Bessiere  (Game Design)
